title: Patching problems.
body: So I just got a new computer today and I decided I was going to install LOL. However for about 8 hours its been not working. Sometimes its stuck at 33% and sometimes it goes up 1 by 1 and then gets stuck at a number like 62.

replies.body: Grats on your new computer!  As a rule of thumb, it's really important that your drivers and OS are up to date to make sure that you have all the necessary products to get through the install!  For your specific issue, at this point the process the patch is trying to connect to our patching server but failing.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network and settings are in order to establish those comms.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
